root.name: Dead Island: Game of the Year Edition
root.description:
The Zombie apocalypse returns with this content packed edition of the fan favourite. ItÂ´s time to return to the beautiful, zombie-infected shores of Banoi!
With the Dead Island Game of the Year Edition players get the chance to experience the full story behind the Banoi Zombie Outbreak. The GOTY includes
Dead Island Maingame Bloodbath Arena DLC Ryder White DLC Blueprint "The Ripper" Weapon Get ready for your return to Dead Island, a paradise to die for!
